title: Average Earnings Per Shift, Anthracite Coal Miners for Dortmund Mining District, Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1884-1920 (2)--Original Data, 1920-1932. Source: For 1884-1913: Statistisches Jahrbuch, 1927, P. 317; For 1914-1920: Zeitschrift Fur Burg-Hutten Und Salinenwesen.

This NBER data series q08147a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: q08147a
